alert.note: Alert for Umatilla; Union (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 6:10PM PDT until May 20 at 7:15PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Umatilla County in northeastern Oregon... West central Union County in northeastern Oregon... * Until 715 PM PDT. * At 609 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lehman Hot Springs, or 20 miles southwest of Meacham, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lehman Hot Springs and southern Umatilla Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
